title: Whittlebury Hall Conference, Training Centre and Hotel attend the World of Learning Exhibition and Conference 2015
text:
Whittlebury Hall Conference, Training Centre and Hotel attend the World of Learning Exhibition and Conference 2015 Whittlebury Hall Conference, Training Centre and Hotel attend the World of Learning Exhibition and Conference 2015 Details Category: Show   15:15 Whittlebury Hall Conference, Training Centre and Hotel will be attending the World of Learning Exhibition and Conference, at the NEC Birmingham on Tuesday 29th and Wednesday 30th September 2015. Whittlebury Hall will be showcasing The Academy, which offers training tailored to businesses needs to help with all aspects of growth and covers areas from Sales and Team Dynamics to Practical Leadership and Finance for business. Whatever your training or event needs, the four star Whittlebury Hall Conference, Training Centre and Hotel has everything you need to ensure it runs smoothly and professionally. 
Michael Stott, Director at Whittlebury Hall Conference, Training Centre and Hotel said: “We are proud to be long standing exhibitors at this event and delighted to showcase our rewards programme, meeting the demands of the corporate market and offering exclusive instant rewards to our clients. “We are also delighted to be once again sponsoring the Business and Networking Lounge this year, where delegates will be able to find out more about The Academy at Whittlebury Hall and have the chance to win a Spa Break for two people. “The Academy is going from strength to strength and this exhibition and conference is yet another excellent platform for our clients to preview the opportunities available to them.
